showScoreExcerpt:
“Clearly, these productions have such a fan base -- the audience at the performance I attended was in a panic state throughout -- that the Mischief people can seemingly keep monetizing their formula until doomsday. All I can tell you is that I -- a lover of British comedy down to the Carry On films -- was stirred to laughter only occasionally.”

Read more

keyPhrases.quote: I was stirred to laughter only occasionally.
